translations: [计][法]授权；授权书（authorization 的复数）

phrs.translation: 鉴别与授权；验证和授权

sentences.sentence: Authorizations can be applied at several levels.
sentences.translation: 授权可以应用若干个不同的层次。

sentences.sentence: Authorizations can also apply at the group level.
sentences.translation: 授权还可以应用于分组级别。

sentences.sentence: First of all, some agencies have expired authorizations.
sentences.translation: 首先，一些机构的授权已经过期。
